page.title: 03SHOPPING IN BEAULIEU
page.content: { The Chocolate Shop}is famous world wide people come from all over the world for these lovely chocolates . Dark chocolates tend to be rich . Milk chocolates tend to be smooth and creamy and they sometimes stick to the roof of your mouth.They also sell fancy chocolates which are very expensive. {The Norris Shop }sells gifts and toys for holiday makers or just collectors e.g you can buy rubbers,postcards,crafts,pens and pencils.If people come to {Beaulieu} for a holiday or weekends they usually buy gifts for relations to remember where they have been. {Kristens Pottery}sells decorated pots and jugs etc. You con buy them for a resonable price. { These are a few of the shops we visited in {Beaulieu}.
